name: Remote Heatwave
description: Video & voice teasing, body-language games, and remote dares designed for couples who want to turn up the heat from a distance. Flirty, daring, and playful.

prompts.text: Send your partner a voice message describing exactly what you'd do if you were in the same room right now.
Make eye contact on camera and slowly remove one item of clothing while describing why you find them attractive.
What's the most daring thing you'd do if no one could find out?
Send your partner a selfie in your current outfit with a flirty caption.
Describe the exact moment you first realized you were attracted to your partner.
Record a 30-second voice message telling your partner your favorite thing about their body.
What would you wear if you knew your partner would see you in it?
Play a song that reminds you of your partner and explain why—be as romantic and flirty as possible.
What's your go-to move to get your partner's attention when you want them?
Send your partner a flirty emoji sequence that describes what you're thinking right now.
Describe your partner's best physical feature in exaggerated, playful detail.
How would your partner describe you in bed? Guess and then ask them to rate your accuracy.
Share your phone's most recently used emoji and explain why it's there.
Create a video call photobomb: silently do something silly or flirty behind the frame and wait for them to notice.
If you could have one fantasy with your partner come true this week, what would it be?
Send a voice message impersonating what you think your partner sounds like during a particular activity.
What's the most spontaneous, risk-taking thing you'd like to do together?
Describe your partner's laugh, smile, or other feature you find irresistible in a love-letter style.
What's one compliment about your partner that you don't say out loud enough?
On a video call, slowly describe what you see when you look at your partner right now—be as sensual as possible.
If you could relive one moment with your partner, what would it be and why?
Send your partner a photo of something on your body you find attractive and ask if they agree.
Describe in detail the physical reaction your partner has that drives you wild.
Create a TikTok-style voiceover: describe your partner as if you're introducing them to the world in 15 seconds.
What outfit or look of yours has gotten the best reaction from your partner?
Send your partner a voice message listing three things you'd love to do together if you were together right now.
What's the most attractive quality your partner has that nobody else sees?
On video call, make a 'come here' gesture and explain exactly what you'd do if they were.
What's your favorite memory of feeling desired by your partner?
Send a voice memo of you recreating your sexiest laugh for your partner.
